title: IKEA / HELLWARE 345 : user manual 1
description: Step 1: Take the wooden plate number 5 and hold it vertically. On it, fix the four bed feet by turning them clockwise until it becomes too hard.

title: IKEA / HELLWARE 345 : user manual step 2
description: Step 2: place the wooden plate on its feet and fix the smaller one using the four screws from bag numbered 1.

title: IKEA / HELLWARE 345 : user manual step 3
description: Step 3: let's attach the wooden decoration. Use the four thin wood planks. Push until you hear the POP sound.

title: IKEA / HELLWARE 345 : user manual step 4
description: Step 4: clean your mess to enjoy this beautiful bed, designed by Ragnar Logbrok for IKEA.
